## Source: ossf-package-analysis (369e3358c08004cd8cc2c6adee4bcc676a6d7923001bd22f876ff320de5e802b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'limit-order-validation' @ 19.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
